CDM Simulator

Simulate Content Decryption Module behavior at different security levels

Understanding CDM Security Levels
The CDM (Content Decryption Module) is the core component that handles license acquisition and content decryption. Security levels determine how well protected the decryption keys are from extraction.

Select CDM protection level
